Howdy there LowEndTalk, MannDude here to let you know about our new crazy deal over at URPad. We've got excess stock in our LA, Chicago, and Dallas location and want to offer you some limited time promotional slots on some of our new machines.

So, what are you waiting for?

10 GB Hard Drive
128 MB Guaranteed RAM
256 MB Burstable RAM
100 GB Bandwidth
Instant Setup

• Los Angeles, CA
• Dallas, TX
• Chicago, IL

All for just <u>$0.66/month ($8/Year)</u>, Limited stock so act fast.

<h3><a href="https://billing.urpad.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=232">Order Now</a></h3>
